clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: We dont collect or share your personal information!

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
PokeTube is free software, You can fork and modify the source code under the terms of the GNU General Public License Version 3 or later. our source code is Here!

see our license page

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: This Service does not keep any logs.
clauses.description: This service is committed to not store any log data at all.
clauses.clause_text: Because this information could be used to link you to your peronsal information, we do not log (store) it at all.

case.text: This Service does not keep any logs.

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: see history of this privacy policy here

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We Dont collect or share your information.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text:
We dont collect your IP address.
Your device metadata (e.g.
device resolution, OS etc.) is not collected in anyway.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text: I (Ashley) am the creator of Poketube and personally wrote this privacy policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please submit feedback on codeberg :3

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
Our servers are secured with SHA-384 Signature Algorithm.
meaning we cant see the videos you watching, things you search, or things you do.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
clauses.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.
clauses.clause_text: Furthermore, we refuse liability for any inappropriate use of PokeTube, such as illegal downloading.

case.text: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
